settings.content: A short sentence describing what someone will receive by subscribing

settings.title: Shipping Time
settings.content:
To US,UK,FR,DE,NZ: 11-21 Business Days
To Other Countries: 15-28 Business Days

Delivery time

After you complete your order on skamx.com, we will process your order as soon as possible. So, when you make a purchase to the time you receive what you expect, it contains two parts. That is

Total time = processing time + shipping time.

For most situations, it takes around 5 business days to complete the processing time.

Shipping time varies depending on the country where you are and the shipping method you choose. For most countries, it takes 10-15 business days (Standard Shipping) or 5-9 business days (Expedited Shipping).

(Notice: Now, we only support the Standard Shipping method. Soon, an Expedited Shipping method will be launched.)

It may take approximately 10 - 20 days to receive your purchased items.

Â 

Free shipping promotion

We will launch free shipping promotions for some countries. Please pay attention to skamx.com

For detailed information and conditions for free shipping, please refer to the website or customer service email massage.
